summary: Auction app with secret-key bidding (secret key stored privately in the canister and not exposed).
architectural_notes: Secret key for bidding is stored privately inside the canister and is not publicly readable/exposed.

existing_features.title: Update all frontend currency formatting, labels, and bid parsing so amounts are treated and displayed as rupees (₹) rather than crores (CR), including budget, spent, highest bid, bid input, and results tables.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change bidder payout/amount to 1000 rupees (set displayed/given amount to ₹1000).
Change the auction's initial bidder budget from the current large CR-based amount to exactly 1000 rupees per bidder for newly created auctions.

projectName: Convert bidder budget and bidding amounts to ₹1000 rupees
